instructions: On the Nest app home screen, tap Settings . Tap Family & Guests . Tap You to change your own passcode. Tap Passcode . If you sign in with a Nest Account, you ll enter your account password, minimize your phone s keyboard, and press Continue . Enter a passcode you ll remember between 4 to 8 digits long. Note: If another person is using this passcode, a notification will pop-up to prompt you to Choose a different passcode . Passcodes must be unique so you can see who armed and disarmed your Guard or locked and unlocked your lock in History . Learn more about Security History in the Nest app Learn more about Nest Yale Lock History in the Nest app Tap Show passcode to view the passcode. Tap Save . If you sign in with a Google Account, you ll receive an email that your passcode has been changed.
